product_context.title: Smart 3 Way Dimmer Switch, Smart WiFi Mesh Dimmable Light Switch Compatible with Alexa, Google Assistant and SmartThings, 2.4GHz Wi-Fi, FCC/ETL Certified, No Hub Required, 1 Pack

reviews.productTitle: Smart 3 Way Dimmer Switch, Smart WiFi Mesh Dimmable Light Switch Compatible with Alexa, Google Assistant and SmartThings, 2.4GHz Wi-Fi, FCC/ETL Certified, No Hub Required, 1 Pack
reviews.text: I’ve encountered some challenges with these switches. After spending several hours trying to establish a connection, I’ve noticed they can be quite glitchy. One of the switches got stuck in Away mode, causing the lights to turn on and off randomly, which was frustrating. In my efforts to resolve the issue, I removed the switch, but unfortunately, it now won’t reconnect. Additionally, when the secondary switch in the 3-way setup is turned off, the Ulink switch makes a persistent clicking noise, which can be quite annoying. Regrettably, we’ve missed the return window and now have 20 of these switches, so I’m hoping for some guidance on how to address these issues.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on April 29, 2025
reviews.title: Glitchy and unreliable

reviews.productTitle: Smart 3 Way Dimmer Switch, Smart WiFi Mesh Dimmable Light Switch Compatible with Alexa, Google Assistant and SmartThings, 2.4GHz Wi-Fi, FCC/ETL Certified, No Hub Required, 1 Pack
reviews.text: If you are not familiar with electrical wiring I would recommend having an electrician install. Although I am not an electrician, I have been wiring houses off and on for many years. It still took me a bit of figuring out (including some changes at the light fixture. Also, as there are many wires (with wire nuts for each) you may need a deep box as the switch itself is fairly large. Alternatively, you can get a electrical box extender which is not as nice looking (as it extends the box out from the wall) but does give enough room in the box if you can't change the box. Outside of the physical installation, The configuration was pretty easy. You have to download the app to your smart phone but from there on it was easy, even connecting to Alexa. Unfortunately for me, the light I had thought was dimmable wasn't so I was unable to check the dimming.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on April 20, 2025
reviews.title: Works well. Wiring is different than just 2 plain 3-way switches.

reviews.productTitle: Smart 3 Way Dimmer Switch, Smart WiFi Mesh Dimmable Light Switch Compatible with Alexa, Google Assistant and SmartThings, 2.4GHz Wi-Fi, FCC/ETL Certified, No Hub Required, 1 Pack

reviews.productTitle: Smart 3 Way Dimmer Switch, Smart WiFi Mesh Dimmable Light Switch Compatible with Alexa, Google Assistant and SmartThings, 2.4GHz Wi-Fi, FCC/ETL Certified, No Hub Required, 1 Pack
reviews.text: Connected and able to control with Amazon Alex for about a day and a half. Then lost pairing and unable to register again no matter what I do. Online reviews show MANY who purchase this switch have the same exact issue and there seems to be no fix. Utec contacted me via email and ask me to try to link to Alexa again and I tried the same process that previously failed many times times and it connected immediately, and I am now able to control with Alexa again now. Thank you utek
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on March 17, 2025
reviews.title: Once lose Alexa pairing useless

reviews.productTitle: Smart 3 Way Dimmer Switch, Smart WiFi Mesh Dimmable Light Switch Compatible with Alexa, Google Assistant and SmartThings, 2.4GHz Wi-Fi, FCC/ETL Certified, No Hub Required, 1 Pack
reviews.text: The instructions pretty much set up the dumb switch as an on/off signal to the smart dimmer, which then itself changes the light setting. A voltage test confirms that it is set up to do just that. But the dimmer doesn't respond Also, there's no way to set the maximum and minimum brightness levels. So you'll have your fingers crossed to see that it doesn't cause flicker or a dead zone for your specific bulbs Otherwise seems fine. I prefer this particular click and capacitive touch over another brand that I tested. Still, if you can't do what you say you can do, 1-star *Can confirm a second unit does not respond to the 3-way dumb switch **Chip inside is an ESP32-C3 which is extremely configurable. Not the easiest to get to, but definitely possible non-destructively. I don't want to give points when you can't do the job you claim to do. But there's a lot to say for being able to completely cut out the 3rd party service
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2025
reviews.title: Doesn't respond to the 3-way dumb switch. No voltage control. ESP32-C3 inside

reviews.productTitle: Smart 3 Way Dimmer Switch, Smart WiFi Mesh Dimmable Light Switch Compatible with Alexa, Google Assistant and SmartThings, 2.4GHz Wi-Fi, FCC/ETL Certified, No Hub Required, 1 Pack
reviews.text: The Smart 3-Way Dimmer Switch has been a fantastic upgrade for my home! Setting it up was super straightforward, even without any prior experience. It’s great to control my lights with Alexa and Google Assistant, making it incredibly convenient to adjust the lighting without getting up. The dimming feature works smoothly, providing just the right light for any situation. I also appreciate that it connects directly to my 2.4GHz Wi-Fi without needing a hub, keeping things simple and efficient. Plus, the FCC/ETL certification gives me peace of mind about its safety and reliability.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on July 30, 2024
reviews.title: Best Dimmer Switch!

reviews.productTitle: Smart 3 Way Dimmer Switch, Smart WiFi Mesh Dimmable Light Switch Compatible with Alexa, Google Assistant and SmartThings, 2.4GHz Wi-Fi, FCC/ETL Certified, No Hub Required, 1 Pack
reviews.text: Followed the instructions for "load-side" 3-way dimmer installation. Unfortunately, modifications must be required for the "line-side" switch which are not included in the installation instructions and support was unwilling or unable to provide. When the dimmer switch was installed as a single pole switch, it caused my dimmable LED lights to flutter and then flicker when dimmed.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on June 25, 2024
reviews.title: Instructions / support are incorrect and/or incomplete.

reviews.productTitle: Smart 3 Way Dimmer Switch, Smart WiFi Mesh Dimmable Light Switch Compatible with Alexa, Google Assistant and SmartThings, 2.4GHz Wi-Fi, FCC/ETL Certified, No Hub Required, 1 Pack
reviews.text: I’ve been using the Smart 3 Way Dimmer Switch for a few weeks now, and it has completely transformed my living space! The installation was super straightforward, and I love that it doesn’t require a hub. It synced effortlessly with my Alexa and Google Assistant, making voice control a breeze. The WiFi connectivity is rock solid, and the mesh network ensures consistent performance throughout my apartment. The dimmable feature is a game-changer, allowing me to set the perfect ambiance for studying, relaxing, or entertaining friends. The switch is responsive, and the app interface is user-friendly. It’s also reassuring to know that it’s FCC/ETL certified, ensuring safety and quality.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on June 20, 2024
reviews.title: Perfect Smart Switch for a Seamless Smart Home Experience

reviews.productTitle: Smart 3 Way Dimmer Switch, Smart WiFi Mesh Dimmable Light Switch Compatible with Alexa, Google Assistant and SmartThings, 2.4GHz Wi-Fi, FCC/ETL Certified, No Hub Required, 1 Pack
reviews.text: After I installed this U-tec dimmer switch, my wife only used the physical on/off once before asking me uninstall it: the lag is much too long between tapping the switch and it turning on the light. Unless this switch is being installed somewhere that a long delay of 1 or 2 seconds is not going to be noticed, pick a different switch. Which is unfortunate because the switch has good installation instructions and comes with labels for the wires, faceplate, screws, and wire-nut connectors. All I needed was phillips and flathead screwdrivers, and electrical pliers. That and lots of space in the electrical box for the big switch housing and its integrated wiring. This is the largest smart switch I've installed. I tried to replace a main Levitron 3-way dimmer switch with this one. It turned the lights on/off and dimmed them, but as soon as I changed anything on the other dimmable switch, the lights kept turning back on. Swapped the old Levitron back in and the 3-way works fine again. Maybe this dimmer switch only works with a dumb on/off only switch as the other switch in a 3-way configuration? The mesh idea sounded appealing, but I can't use these switches for my house. I thought about giving a 2 star rating, but they might be okay for someone that doesn't care about the lag time or 3-way problem.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on June 18, 2024
reviews.title: VERY slow to turn on light, even physically at the switch. Needs lots of space in box.

reviews.text: This is a super smart Dimmer swith, bought it for my kitchen lighting. It took me just under 15 min with the instruction sheet to self install without any issues. It is a perfect switch size that fits in the regular switch board. The connection diagrams are accurate and works as expected once this has setup with the correct connections. It looks great in my kitchen and easy to operate. The Dimmer settings holds up well on the switch for last settings and retrieves it original settings once it is turned on. The switch can also be control with the u home app and it took me just 5 mins to set up the device in the app for essy access. The automation part is awesome and works as expected. It is very inexpensive and easy to setup. Love my purchase and I recommend this for evevyhome for Dimmer switch at home.

reviews.title: Smart dimmer!

reviews.productTitle: Smart 3 Way Dimmer Switch, Smart WiFi Mesh Dimmable Light Switch Compatible with Alexa, Google Assistant and SmartThings, 2.4GHz Wi-Fi, FCC/ETL Certified, No Hub Required, 1 Pack
reviews.text: I've had some switches like this before and wanted to upgrade another one that was for the stairs. It was a 3 way and this did the trick. I had the neutral line in the box, I checked before ordering. It was easy to install by following the existing switch wiring. A few wire nuts later and it was ready to go. This is a decent sized switch and there will be plenty of wire in a box for a 3 way, so you will most likely need a deeper box to install this. This switch doesn't activate like a standard decora switch. It's more of a lever style. The top doesn't move and you just push the bottom of the switch to click it on or off, the touch slider in the middle is to adjust brightness. This does have a more satisfying click than this other similar smart switches I have. more of a positive click than a springy higher pitch click. Hard to describe but it just seems better The no screw faceplate is a nice touch, except the brand name is embossed on it. Kind of lame and I wish it was just solid. I did not use it. I also wish the switch didn't have a little lamp on it and was just plain. Most major switch brands don't need to advertise right on their products what they are.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on April 27, 2024
reviews.title: Upgrade that old boring switch.

reviews.productTitle: Smart 3 Way Dimmer Switch, Smart WiFi Mesh Dimmable Light Switch Compatible with Alexa, Google Assistant and SmartThings, 2.4GHz Wi-Fi, FCC/ETL Certified, No Hub Required, 1 Pack
reviews.text: I ordered the #UTec 3-way Smart Dimmer Switch to install in our dining room. We recently replaced the builder grade chandelier with a larger chandelier which has a lot more bulbs. Now the dining room is too bright. This dimmer switch solved that issue and gives us the ability to fine tune the amount of light depending on the mood. Installation was straightforward and it does need a neutral wire to be installed. It didn't require any additional space inside the box and the fit and finish of the final product are excellent. Operation of the switch is easy and it's a matter of sliding your finger up/down the center of the switch to dim/brighten the room. Integration into the Echo ecosystem was easy as well and we had voice control in a matter of minutes. Very happy with the UTec 3-way smart dimmer switch and will order more for other rooms in our home.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on April 19, 2024
reviews.title: Easy to install plus home automation

You can schedule when you want it to go on or off as well as setting your brightness which is a great feature if you don't want people knowing you are away. Everything works smoothly and I am looking forward to purchasing more for other areas of my house.

reviews.productTitle: Smart 3 Way Dimmer Switch, Smart WiFi Mesh Dimmable Light Switch Compatible with Alexa, Google Assistant and SmartThings, 2.4GHz Wi-Fi, FCC/ETL Certified, No Hub Required, 1 Pack
reviews.text: We all dream of turning lights on and off without getting up. This is better than clapping. Just turn it on or off with voice commands through Alexa or Google, or through a phone app. Laziness at its finest. Works well for us. My husband’s complaint was: it won’t work if the WiFi goes down. True. But if the WiFi goes down, it is exactly as if we have a normal light. . . which we have already. Seems like a win to me. We installed in a basement room where the light often gets left on and we hate to go down late to deal with it. Good dimmer functionality.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on April 11, 2024
reviews.title: Quality switch with great WiFi capability - control from multiple phone apps.

Just be sure to shut the power off and you’ll be fine. I love the fact that this doesn’t need a separate hub to work. If you wanna go ahead and have a light switch with a dimmer that makes your home smart then this is a good product for you.

reviews.title: Easy to install

reviews.productTitle: Smart 3 Way Dimmer Switch, Smart WiFi Mesh Dimmable Light Switch Compatible with Alexa, Google Assistant and SmartThings, 2.4GHz Wi-Fi, FCC/ETL Certified, No Hub Required, 1 Pack
reviews.text: I have 2 switches in 2 different locations to control lights in my attached garage and got this switch because I don't have replace the other switch. It needs to be installed in junction box where power is split and the other switch may need to be slightly rewired to send power back to the traveler wire. Back of the switch has aluminum cover to cool power electronics. Screw free wall plate, wire connectors and mounting screws are included. You can use other decorator type face covers for installation into multi-gang junction boxes. U-Tec app offers the same features as Smart Life and can be integrated with Google Home app or Amazon Alexa for voice control or multi-device smart scenes.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on April 9, 2024
reviews.title: 3 way dimmer can be wired with standard non-smart switches.

reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on April 9, 2024

reviews.productTitle: Smart 3 Way Dimmer Switch, Smart WiFi Mesh Dimmable Light Switch Compatible with Alexa, Google Assistant and SmartThings, 2.4GHz Wi-Fi, FCC/ETL Certified, No Hub Required, 1 Pack
reviews.text: I used this switch to replace one of the switches on my 2-switch kitchen light. It was simple enough to install once you figure out which wire in the wall is which -- a multimeter really helps here -- just be careful with the live voltage until you figure out which wire is which. At this point, turn off your breaker and begin connecting the wires. The included wire nuts make this easy! You may need to get a larger wire nut if you are connecting more than 3 wires. I have a deicated 2.4GHz IoT network at home, so connecting it to my network was pretty straightforward. The U Home app made it simple and the connection to Alexa work flawlessly.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on April 8, 2024
reviews.title: Works perfectly!

reviews.productTitle: Smart 3 Way Dimmer Switch, Smart WiFi Mesh Dimmable Light Switch Compatible with Alexa, Google Assistant and SmartThings, 2.4GHz Wi-Fi, FCC/ETL Certified, No Hub Required, 1 Pack
reviews.text: Ordered this wall switch for our hallway light. This smart switch has the ability to be controlled by my voice (using Alexa) or by the U-tec app. It is frustrating to me that companies feel the need to spend tons of money and man hours trying to “reinvent the wheel” making their own standalone phone software when there is no reason for such wastefulness. More than 50% of all smart devices use one of two industry standard apps, either Tuya or Smartlife. Surely one of these app could have done the job for U-tec and they could have spent the money they saved on developing new product! As for this product, the dimming at the wall is smooth and defiantly stepless. I love the feel of this smart wall switch. The WiFi mesh means it can be installed pretty much anywhere in the house and still have a good connection. At the time of this review the U-tec Smart 3 Way Dimmer Switch was selling for $21.99 which is a good price for a 3-way WiFi mesh switch. Despite the disappointment of the proprietary app this is a great quality switch and I highly recommend it!
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on April 8, 2024
reviews.title: Great price for a WiFi mesh switch but sadly uses a proprietary app

reviews.productTitle: Smart 3 Way Dimmer Switch, Smart WiFi Mesh Dimmable Light Switch Compatible with Alexa, Google Assistant and SmartThings, 2.4GHz Wi-Fi, FCC/ETL Certified, No Hub Required, 1 Pack

Just make sure the neutral wire is available. The setup to get it connected to the app is also simple. The only complain is that I hope the manual switch could be more responsive.

reviews.title: Works great with alexa

reviews.productTitle: Smart 3 Way Dimmer Switch, Smart WiFi Mesh Dimmable Light Switch Compatible with Alexa, Google Assistant and SmartThings, 2.4GHz Wi-Fi, FCC/ETL Certified, No Hub Required, 1 Pack
reviews.text: I have several switches installed that work with Alexa but this is the first dimmable one. The switch is pretty easy to install. It can be used as a single pole or a 3 way switch. I installed it as a 3 way. I really like these three way switches especially since I only need one smart one and can keep the other as a regular 3 way (non smart) switch. The dimming works great. I love a dimmed light when watching TV.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on April 6, 2024
reviews.title: Works with Alexa

reviews.productTitle: Smart 3 Way Dimmer Switch, Smart WiFi Mesh Dimmable Light Switch Compatible with Alexa, Google Assistant and SmartThings, 2.4GHz Wi-Fi, FCC/ETL Certified, No Hub Required, 1 Pack
reviews.text: The last 3-way smart switch I got was not actually a 3-way switch, it just claimed to be in the description. This actually has the traveler wire and works with a 'dumb' switch. While only one side has the dimmer control, since it is also voice capable you can dim the lights from anywhere. Physically, this is on the larger side, so you do need to make sure you have ample room in your switchbox - but being a 3-way dimmer smart switch, the size is as expected. Setup is not only relatively easy, but this may be one of the most comprehensive set of instructions I have seen in a while. It literally walks you step by step through the installation procedure, even if you do not have a lot of electrical experience. Healthy load handling capacity, 430 watts incandescent, and 250 LED or CFL. That's a lot of lighting. The finished product is very high tech, the sliding dimmer is first class. No moving parts, you simply swipe up or down with your finger, and the indicator lights follow. There is also an indicator light glowing whether on or off, green when on, and white when off. If it were a completely dark room, you can easily find your switch. Also lets you know it has power and is live. Very nice product lives up to its expectations.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on April 4, 2024
reviews.title: "Real" 3-way smart dimmer switch

reviews.productTitle: Smart 3 Way Dimmer Switch, Smart WiFi Mesh Dimmable Light Switch Compatible with Alexa, Google Assistant and SmartThings, 2.4GHz Wi-Fi, FCC/ETL Certified, No Hub Required, 1 Pack
reviews.text: This works well and is VERY inexpensive compared to similarly capable products from other brands. U-tec has for years made some of the (if not the very) best smart locks on the planet. This is a nice entry into the smart-lighting arena. For the price, I think you'd be hard pressed to find a better switch. I don't love the tactile feeling of the switch, but that is true of literally every smart switch out there. They all use shallow, clicky microswitches. Or, as here, the mechanism feels a bit mushy. Every smart switch FEELS cheap when you press the button. That's a shame. But at least for now, there's nothing to do about it. Nobody makes a good one. The dimming mechanism here is nice--much better than switches where you just have to hold the button down to dim--which invariably causes the light to dim way too fast, so you always find yourself overshooting your target and it often takes several tries to land on a dimness level close to what you want. Installation is fine--about the same as any other smart switch. Note that you need a neutral wire (if you don't currently have smart switches, this will be the white wires in the box that are currently doing nothing--just connected together with a wire nut). If you don't have a neutral wire in the electrical box, you will have to find an alternative. There are a few smart switches on the market that work without a neutral wire. Lutron and GE both make such switches.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on April 4, 2024
reviews.title: Very good value

reviews.productTitle: Smart 3 Way Dimmer Switch, Smart WiFi Mesh Dimmable Light Switch Compatible with Alexa, Google Assistant and SmartThings, 2.4GHz Wi-Fi, FCC/ETL Certified, No Hub Required, 1 Pack
reviews.text: The dimmer isn't working and when I tried to get support they replied that I should get an electrician to rewire my house. Even though my mechanical switch works perfectly. Not great support. They also said that the dimmer doesn't work with incandescent bulbs because they're not dimmable; incandescent bulbs are inherently dimmable. Not great support. I would never recommend this dimmer switch.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on April 3, 2024
reviews.title: Doesn't Work, Bad Support

I'm going to use it for a different location. The bottom is a nice push button and then you slide your finger up and down over the lights to change the brightness, that part worked and was really nice. The WiFi app and connectivity is also a nice option to have available. I'll try and update once I move to another location but from what my tests were with the bad light I wouldn't hesitate to recommend this dimmer.

reviews.title: Nice dimmer

reviews.title: Switch!

reviews.productTitle: Smart 3 Way Dimmer Switch, Smart WiFi Mesh Dimmable Light Switch Compatible with Alexa, Google Assistant and SmartThings, 2.4GHz Wi-Fi, FCC/ETL Certified, No Hub Required, 1 Pack
reviews.text: I'm sure this would work for certain applications, but I ordered this a little knee-jerk. This requires a neutral wire, so if you have older wiring this may not work. There are smart switches that don't need that neutral wire, so that is important to know. I have a very old house, but I thought the wiring going to the outlet I was planning on using this on had been recently replaced. It had not, so no neutral. Another thing to take note of is it only works on 2.4ghz. I'm sure I'm not the only one that never used 2.4ghz WiFi, so disabling it made sense. The emergence of smart switches seems to be bringing it back, but make sure you have that available. All said, it feels like a good quality switch. It would have looked sharp and been very convenient in that room, but I guess I'll have to find another place to put it.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on April 1, 2024
reviews.title: Neutral wire required

reviews.productTitle: Smart 3 Way Dimmer Switch, Smart WiFi Mesh Dimmable Light Switch Compatible with Alexa, Google Assistant and SmartThings, 2.4GHz Wi-Fi, FCC/ETL Certified, No Hub Required, 1 Pack
reviews.text: This is a good light switch that wasn't too difficult to install. I like that everything can be controlled in the app as well as using the Alexa or Google assistance to control the light in the bedroom. I like that I am able to dim the lights either by voice, in the app or on the wall switch itself. Everything is working well and hopefully this light switch lasts for many years to come without any issues.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on March 31, 2024
reviews.title: Easy to use single pole light switch

reviews.productTitle: Smart 3 Way Dimmer Switch, Smart WiFi Mesh Dimmable Light Switch Compatible with Alexa, Google Assistant and SmartThings, 2.4GHz Wi-Fi, FCC/ETL Certified, No Hub Required, 1 Pack
reviews.text: I received this dimmer light switch well packaged in excellent condition. Out of the box straight forward installation, black wire line power, red wire load to light, white neutral, green ground, and blue to 3-way switch. I only have single pole and I used wire nut & tape on the blue wire. Switch works perfect manually and with the app. Program feature to set dimmer and it returns to that setting when powered off and back on. I installed for a 3-pendant LED light, and no flickering no matter what the dimmer set at. Excellent quality attractive switch.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on March 30, 2024
reviews.title: Excellent quality led dimmable light switch

reviews.productTitle: Smart 3 Way Dimmer Switch, Smart WiFi Mesh Dimmable Light Switch Compatible with Alexa, Google Assistant and SmartThings, 2.4GHz Wi-Fi, FCC/ETL Certified, No Hub Required, 1 Pack
reviews.text: No lo compren, aparenta ser un buen producto, funcionó 2 meses y ya no funcionó correctamente. La aplicación tiene Bugs, comparando con otras apps es un poco más complicado configurarlo.
reviews.date: Reviewed in Mexico on August 15, 2024
reviews.title: Dejó de funcionar
